commit.message:
allocator_traits.h: Fix doxygen markup.

2003-07-06  Phil Edwards  <pme@gcc.gnu.org>

	* include/bits/allocator_traits.h:  Fix doxygen markup.
	* include/ext/mt_allocator.h:  Likewise.

From-SVN: r68994
